mapper.select: select a.T_IDOSS_PERMOHONAN_ID nomor , to_char(a.tgl_permohonan ,'dd-MON-yyyy mm:hh') tanggal,a.TYPE_PERMOHONAN, a.DETAIL_PERMOHONAN deskripsi, a.NAMA_PEMOHON , a.BAGIAN_PEMOHON, b.NAMA_PELAKSANA, to_char(b.UPDATED_DATE ,'dd-MON-yyyy mm:hh') tgl_pelaksana from T_IDOSS_PERMOHONAN a, T_IDOSS_PELAKSANAAN b where a.T_IDOSS_PERMOHONAN_ID=b.T_IDOSS_PELAKSANAAN_ID
